Hi Jiny
Have approved the PR, could you help check the '/dolphinscheduler/projects/4928357584512/task-definition/5240600180736/with-upstream'
have similar issue.
The API function is at task instance page, first you create a new task instance, and next when you edit the task instance and submit, it will delete the related  t_ds_process_task_relation_log and the process name will missing.
Yours

When I create a project with the administrator, and then manually set a normal user for the user to which the project belongs. At this time, go to the user management in the security center to check the assignment status. A display error will occur.


### What you expected to happen

After I create a project, I manually set a common user for the user to which the project belongs, and the Security Center will synchronize the authorization status.

### How to reproduce

1. Use admin to create a new project
2. admin changes the user to ordinary user A
3. The administrator goes to Security Center - User Management - Ordinary User A - Authorization Items

> I have tested a similar situation. When uploading a file without any suffix it is not allowed. However, if the file is a *.jar, it is possible to upload it without the .jar suffix, but it will not work.

In our production environment, some users do want to upload files without suffix, like binary executable file. For the case that a file is *.jar but upload without .jar suffix, i think it's best for users themselves to ensure the correctness of uploaded files.

Some wired issues appeared when I tried to fix this. It took me quite some time to figure out what was really going on here.

Actually, db initialization failure is not directly caused by outdated `soft_version`. There are two main reasons: 
1. `create-schema.sh` is outdated and some paths in it are incorrect, failing to get correct db type. https://github.com/apache/dolphinscheduler/blob/239be31ab732f5bbe68fca3033245125e8388657/dolphinscheduler-tools/src/main/bin/create-schema.sh#L22-L27
2. SQL scripts in `dolphinscheduler-dao/src/main/resources/sql/upgrade/2.1.0_schema` causes a few duplicate key and duplicate index error. https://github.com/apache/dolphinscheduler/blob/239be31ab732f5bbe68fca3033245125e8388657/dolphinscheduler-dao/src/main/resources/sql/upgrade/2.1.0_schema/mysql/dolphinscheduler_ddl.sql#L18-L30

Looks cool! I believe it will help make the code more robust : )

Supporting multiple environments is a good requirement.

Here are a few questions I can think of that might be involved:

1. The resource center on DS is currently stored on the same set of HDFS, and is pulled from HDFS when DS is executed.
If it is a multi-cluster, you need to consider how to design file storage.
2. Currently ds supports kerberbos authentication. If kerberos authentication is enabled for multiple clusters, how does kerberos authenticate?
Enable kerberbos mutual trust or use the same set of kerberbos authentication?
3. The client/configuration files of multiple cluster environments are different, how to manage them. For example, hadoop and spark versions are configured differently.
4. The general requirement to support multiple environments should be to push tasks from the development environment to the production environment. Is there a review and release process for this?

----------------------------------
